name: Hamza Aitali
desc: Life is short, program it well, a software engineer in Morocco.
aboutDesc: Balancing my role as a full-time student with my experience as a full-stack software engineer, I bring a strong blend of theoretical knowledge and practical skills to each project. My drive for continuous learning and problem-solving motivates me to excel in both solo and team-based settings. I am excited to apply my expertise to a new opportunity where I can help create innovative solutions and advance within a progressive team.
